[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P3: F, 55, Attorney, Bexley, Biden 2020, longtime Democrat, abortion focus]
Q: What about Jim Stanton?
"He's a Trump clone. Election denial, extreme on abortion, the whole package."
